info.name: ITP test
info.description:
# Introduction
ITPService doc and test

# Overview
Doc info and auto test with views file  
views001: Authentification  
views002: Device management  
views003: Upload and download files  
views004: Models, mrs task and eas anomaly management  
views005: Risklevel and data info  
views006: Xrs forensics, eas report and eas summary

# Authentication
Basic authentication using ip and token 

# Error Codes
status: 1, "Basic error  
status: 2, "Timestamp error  
status: 3, "Authentication failed  
status: 4, "Not rigister  
status: 5, "No file upload  
status: 6, "Data not found  
status: 7, "Elasticsearch Connection refused  
status: 8, "Elasticsearch query error  
status: 9, "Object error  
status: 10, "Password error  
status: 99, Unknown error or Name Error  

# Rate limit
Token expiration time is 3600 seconds

# Usages
1.do check in requests(in views001.py)  
2.do register device (deviceID:postman-test, if need)  
3.admin debug info, use Headers(ip:admin-ip)

exec: pm.test("Response code is 200 and have a body", function(){
